name: urbanistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to the life of cities and towns, or the study and planning of them : Part One of the book deals with the history of urban research and urbanistic thought. The new forms of suburban design included well-defined neighbourhoods, urbanistic centres, and green corridors.
More examplesFewer examplesThe area around the new estate was very different from it in urbanistic and architectural terms.Their first tower block was 20 storeys high, and related to its surroundings in an urbanistic way.He is not sufficiently challenged for his failed social and urbanistic ideas.
